entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's best friend, also a student at Hogwarts. He is violently sick in the pumpkin patch after being attacked by spiders.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a close friend of Harry's family. He is accused of opening the Chamber of Secrets, but is later found to be innocent.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: A giant spider that lives in the forest near Hogwarts. It is a pet of Hagrid's and is not aggressive towards friends.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A maximum-security prison for wizards and witches, where Hagrid is sent after being accused of opening the Chamber of Secrets.

entities.name: chamber of secrets
entities.description: A hidden chamber within Hogwarts that has been reopened, causing chaos and terror among the students.

relationships.description: Hagrid is the owner of Aragog, a giant spider that lives in the forest near Hogwarts.
Ron blames Hagrid for sending them into danger and accuses him of being irresponsible.
Harry believes that Aragog would not hurt friends of Hagrid's, implying a friendly relationship between Harry and the giant spider.
